docs.title: About
docs.text: Documentation, Help Guide and Portfolio for OpenFOAM. Hosted on GitPages, built using MKDocs.

docs.title: Welcome to the Case Studies
docs.text: This section contains the case files and outputs of CFD workloads I have run using OpenFOAM. Files for anything from Tutorials will also be here.

docs.title: Welcome to the OpenFOAM Tutorials Section
docs.text: This section is essentially my docs and help guide for OpenFOAM, aimed at making getting into CFD and Linux as smoothly and pleasantly as possible (T&C’s Apply)

docs.title: Symbols
docs.text: List of symbols and admonitions that will be referenced in Tutorials and Case Studies.

docs.title: Admonitions
docs.text:
These admonitions contain Warnings, pay careful attention to these.

These admonitions warn of Dangers, AVOID THIS UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCE. There will hopefully be very few instances.

These admonitions contain Tips, following these may or may not streamlines your workflow.

These admonitions contain Notes, these serve as reminders.

These admonitions contain Examples, where I will try really really hard to explain tricky content using an analogy.

These admonitions contain codeblock/outputs of expected Success. Well done your competant, yaay....

These admonitions contain codeblock/outputs of failures. Most of these will come from GitHub Issues. Well done your competant

These admonitions contain Values that will be used in the solve.

docs.title: General Variables
docs.text: \(q, s\) \(~~~~~~\) Scalars \(\mathbf{a}, \mathbf{b}, \mathbf{c}\) \(~~~~~~\) Vectors \(\mathbf{S}, \mathbf{T}, \mathbf{Y}\) \(~~~~~~\) Tensors \(x, y, z\) \(~~~~~~\) Cartesian Coordinate System \(\mathbf{I}\) \(~~~~~~\) Identity Tensor \(\psi\) \(~~~~~~\) general parameter: scalar, vector or tensor

docs.title: Geometry and Mesh
docs.text: \(\mathbf{C}\) \(~~~~~~\) Cell Centre \(\mathbf{C_f}\) \(~~~~~\) Face Centre \(\mathbf{n}\) \(~~~~~~~\) Normal Vector of Unit Length \(\mathbf{p}\) \(~~~~~~~\) Point Location \(S\) \(~~~~~~~\) Surface \(V\) \(~~~~~~~\) Volume
